      • getLatestActiveWorkflowDefinitions

        java.util.List<StoredWorkflowDefinitionWithProject> getLatestActiveWorkflowDefinitions(int siteId,
                                                                                       int limit,
                                                                                       java.lang.String lastIdCond,
                                                                                       java.lang.String namePattern,
                                                                                       java.lang.String projectNamePattern,
                                                                                       java.lang.String orderDirection,
                                                                                       java.lang.String acFilter)
        Specified by:
        getLatestActiveWorkflowDefinitions in interface DatabaseProjectStoreManager.Dao
        Parameters:
        siteId - Target site_id
        limit - Number of workflows to be returned
        lastIdCond - Pagination based on workflow id. Must "> n" or "< n"
        namePattern - Search by workflow name with partial match. namePattern and projectNamePattern is "OR" search.
        projectNamePattern - Search by project name with partial match. namePattern and projectNamePattern is "OR" search.
        orderDirection - Order based on workflow id. "asc" or "desc". The parameter must be validated before calling to avoid SQL injection.
        acFilter - AccessControl filter clause. The parameter must be validated before calling to avoid SQL injection.
        Returns:
